name: @status-machina/knexjs-pg-pattern
description: Event sourcing pattern for PostgreSQL in KnexJS

scripts.test: fun() { npm run build && npm run test:setup && vitest --run --pool=threads --no-isolate "$@" && npm run test:teardown; }; fun
scripts.test:watch: fun() { npm run build && npm run test:setup && vitest --pool=threads --no-isolate "$@" && npm run test:teardown; }; fun
scripts.test:coverage: fun() { npm run build && npm run test:setup && TEST_COVERAGE=true vitest --run --pool=threads --no-isolate --coverage "$@" && npm run test:teardown; }; fun
scripts.test:dist: fun() { npm run build && npm run test:setup && TEST_COVERAGE=false vitest --run --pool=threads --no-isolate "$@" && npm run test:teardown; }; fun
scripts.test:setup: docker compose up -d && npm run wait-for-db && npm run migrate

author: Status Machina
